word:
What is the result of giving loose rein to the lower passions? The delicate organs of women are worn out. . . . Loathsome practices lead to loathsome diseases. That which God has given as a blessing is made a curse. . . . The most terrible diseases are the sure result of incontinence that is pursued. And the animal propensities are inflamed by gross living, practices, especially by a flesh diet. . . 


                                     -210-
